brand.name: nyayasetu.ai
brand.description: Making legal documents accessible through AI-powered analysis and plain-language explanations.

hero.title: See Your Legal Documents Clearly
hero.description: Upload any legal document and get instant plain-language summaries, risk analysis, and actionable insights powered by advanced AI.

upload.title: Upload Document
upload.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your document here
upload.orClickToSelect: or click to select a file
upload.pasteText: Or paste your document text here
upload.textPlaceholder: Paste your legal document text here...
upload.fileTooLargeDesc: Please select a file smaller than 10MB.
upload.invalidFileTypeDesc: Please select a PDF, DOCX, or TXT file.
upload.uploadErrorDesc: Failed to upload document. Please try again.
upload.analysisErrorDesc: Failed to analyze document. Please try again.
upload.serviceUnavailableDesc: The AI analysis service is experiencing high demand. Please try again in a few moments.
upload.connectionErrorDesc: Unable to connect to the analysis service. Please check your internet connection and try again.
upload.timeoutErrorDesc: The analysis is taking longer than expected. Please try again with a shorter document.

loading.title: Analyzing Your Document
loading.description: Our AI is carefully reviewing your document to provide comprehensive insights...

chat.title: Ask Questions
chat.placeholder: Ask a question about your document...
chat.noDocument: Please upload a document first to start asking questions.
chat.error: Failed to get answer. Please try again.

welcome.title: Upload a Document to Get Started
welcome.description: Choose a legal document from your device or paste the text directly. Our AI will analyze it and provide you with clear, actionable insights.

analyzing.title: Analyzing Your Document
analyzing.description: Our AI is carefully reviewing your document to provide comprehensive insights...

hero.title: Welcome to
hero.subtitle: NyayaSetu.AI
hero.description: Transform complex legal documents into clear, actionable insights with our advanced AI technology

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to understand and analyze legal documents with confidence

instantSummaries.title: Instant Summaries
instantSummaries.description: Get plain-language summaries of complex legal documents in seconds. No more struggling with legal jargon.

riskAnalysis.title: AI-Powered Risk Analysis
riskAnalysis.description: Identify potential risks, unusual terms, and key clauses automatically using advanced AI algorithms.

clauseBreakdown.title: Clause Breakdown
clauseBreakdown.description: See original and simplified versions of important contract clauses with detailed explanations.

accessible.title: Accessible for Everyone
accessible.description: Designed for both legal professionals and everyday users with intuitive, user-friendly interface.

benefits.title: Why Choose NyayaSetu.AI?
benefits.subtitle: Empower yourself with intelligent legal document analysis

saveTime.title: Save Time and Money
saveTime.description: Reduce legal review costs and get instant analysis of your documents.

understandSigning.title: Understand Before Signing
understandSigning.description: Know your rights and obligations clearly before making any commitments.

spotRisks.title: Spot Hidden Risks
spotRisks.description: Identify potential issues and negotiate better terms with confidence.

actionableInsights.title: Actionable Insights
actionableInsights.description: Get clear, practical recommendations you can act on immediately.

readyToStart.title: Ready to Get Started?
readyToStart.description: Join thousands of users who trust NyayaSetu.AI for their legal document analysis needs.

security.title: Security & Privacy First
security.subtitle: Your documents and privacy are protected with enterprise-grade security

dataSafe.title: Your Data is Safe
dataSafe.description: We never store your documents. All analysis is performed securely and confidentially with end-to-end encryption.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Your privacy is our top priority. No data is shared with third parties, and all processing happens locally.

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.informational: This tool is for informational purposes only.
disclaimer.notRely: Do not rely solely on its analysis for legal decisions.
disclaimer.consultAdvocate: Always consult a qualified advocate or legal professional for advice specific to your situation.
